body.description: Product Description Tampax Radiant DuoPack (regular and super) plastic tampons give you the confidence and freedom of up to 100% leak & odor-free protection. Our quietest tampon wrappers are fierce, fun-patterned, and re-sealable! Tampax Radiant tampons have a CleanGrip applicator designed for incredible comfort and a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks before they happen. So don't let a little thing like your period stop you from living life to the fullest. From the Manufacturer Stay covered with your ultimate protection experience. view largerOur ultimate protection experience. Tampax Radiant combines our best-ever leakage protection with a one-of-a-kind resealable wrapper for ultra-discreet disposal.Get up to eight hours of leak-free and worry-free protection, thanks to FormFit expansion and a LeakGuard Braid.At a GlanceLeakGuard Braid helps catch leaksTampon gently expands with the FormFit shapePosition precisely with the CleanGrip applicatorWorry-free disposal with our CleanSeal resealable wrapperKey Features view largerCleanGrip ApplicatorDesigned for incredible comfort view largerLeakGuard BraidHelps stop leaks before they happen view largerFormFit DesignGently expands to fit your unique body shape view largerCleanSeal WrapperDiscreet and resealable for worry-free disposalFrequently Asked QuestionsHow does Tampax Radiant help stop leaks?The Tampax Radiant tampon has built-in backup protection. It’s designed to expand widthwise to fit your unique form and has a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen.How does Tampax Radiant feel different from our cardboard tampons?This tampon has a smooth, plastic applicator and rounded tip for comfortable insertion. Plus, it has a CleanGrip applicator designed for incredible comfort and a CleanSeal resealable wrapper for worry-free disposal.If I like Tampax Radiant, what other products would be right for me?Try Always Radiant Infinity for protection that is amazingly absorbent, soft, and flexible with a light, fresh scent. And for daily freshness, check out Always Radiant Incredibly Thin Daily Liners designed to fit multiple panty styles—even thongs.Also Try view largerFor complete protection during your period and every day of the month, try Always Infinity Radiant Pads and Always Radiant Liners.Product Comparison Tampax Radiant Tampax Compak Pearl Tampax Pearl Original Tampax Tampax Pearl Active Tampax Radiant tampons, our ultimate protection experience, have a resealable wrapper for our most discreet disposal. For discreet and portable protection, try Tampax Radiant Compak tampons. Tampax Compak Pearl gives you a full-size tampon in a small, extendable plastic applicator. Tampax Pearl offers incredible protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks. Tampax cardboard has an absorbent core designed to fit your unique shape. Tampax Pearl Active Plastic offer high-performance protection that help outlast the toughest workouts. FormFit gently expands to every shape, while an Antigravity Backup Braid helps stop leaks. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LeakGuard Braid Tampax Radiant Tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid. Textured Grip Tampax Radiant Tampons feature a Textured Grip for easy, comfortable placement. CleanSeal Wrapper With the CleanSeal Wrapper, disposal is easy no matter where you are. Long-Lasting Protection Tampax Radiant Tampons provide up to eight hours of protection. LeakGuard Braid Textured Grip CleanSeal Wrapper Long-Lasting Protection

Tampax Radiant Tampons Tampax Pocket Radiant Tampons Always Radiant Liners Always Radiant Pads Always Radiant Overnight Pads Choose the product that's right for you Tampax Radiant Tampons provide up to 100% Leak & Odor-Free protection. Tampax Pocket Radiant Tampons provide up to 100% Leak & Odor-Free protection that fits discreetly in your pocket. Stay fresh every day of the month with Always Radiant Daily Liners for up to 100% leak-free protection. Always Radiant is made with FlexFoam for a thin and flexible pad with up to 100% leak and odor-free protection. Specially designed for nighttime use, made with FlexFoam for Zero- Feel protection.

Find your Flow Combo Your period is different every day of your flow, so why wear the same tampon absorbency? Tampax Radiant tampons come in different absorbencies, so you can move up or down as needed. A lot of women experience a heavier flow in the beginning of their period, and then it gets lighter toward the end. So you might want to think about switching between different absorbencies. If the tampon reaches full absorption before four hours, you need a higher absorbency like Super or Super Plus for extra protection. If there is still white fiber showing after four to eight hours, you need a lower absorbency. Use for a maximum of eight hours. FAQ How do I use a Tampax Radiant Tampon Applicator? Tampax Radiant tampons have a textured grip applicator for easy and comfortable insertion. With the removal string hanging down, insert the outer tube at a slight upward angle, toward the small of your back. Gently slide the applicator all the way in until your fingers touch your body. Then push the inner tube all the way into the outer tube until the ends of both tubes are even. Place the used applicator back into the wrapper and throw it away. How does Tampax Radiant stop leaks? Tampax Radiant has a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen. What makes Tampax Pocket Radiant different from Tampax Radiant? Tampax Pocket Radiant compact tampons offer the same protection as Tampax Radiant tampons, but are more discreet. They're a full-size tampon in a smaller extendable applicator. Find your Flow Combo FAQ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great product with great features
reviews.reviewText: Ok, it's a little awkward deciding to write a review of a feminine product, which is why I guess there aren't any on here! But as a woman, I know it would help me tremendously to have another woman's opinion so here goes!I've been using this specific product for a while now and will not go back to any previous versions Tampax has put out. The Pearl line was great, but this specific product is perfect. I haven't had any issues with this product at all, it's simple, easy to use, and perfect for women and girls alike.What makes this so great is not what you would imagine though. yes, the applicator is comfortable and sleek and simple and works terrifically well, but what really stands out to me is the applicator bag. Most tampons have a pouch that is either sealed on both ends or peels open at one, and this pouch has a re-sealable tab that allows you to easily remove the tampon/applicator from the pouch and then easily and efficiently place the applicator back in and securely seal it for disposal! Really, this seems like a feature all tampons should have! I'm personally so happy they came out with this idea and executed it so perfectly well!The re-sealable tab really does reseal tightly and securely and really is super easy to open. There is no fumbling to try and get it open, and it provides a clean, sanitary disposal option which seems like it should have always been a top priority for product designers in this industry!I'm extremely happy with this brand and this product and in general the duopack concept is perfect as well. I can't imagine trying any other option after finding this, and so far I haven't wanted to!I would recommend this for both women experienced with these products as well as for young girls just experimenting to see what works and is comfortable for them. I have sons, but if i had a daughter I would be buying her these as well!(Phew! That wasn't so bad!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022

reviews.reviewText: These work as expected, really nothing more to say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and clean
reviews.reviewText: I like these tampons, as tampons go. One of the problems I've had is the disposal of the case after inserting a new tampon. Tampax to the rescue! The radiant line provides a neat way to wrap the applicator, or the used tampon, then seal it before disposal. Also, the applicator glides very smoothly, as does any bodily fluids adhering to it, so be sure to hold the used applicator over the toilet or wipe it with tissue before inserting in the plastic sleeve for disposal. I like the radiant line more than the compact plastics, but I only use the deoderant free version, since the others irritate me. I wish Tampax made a Super Plus/Super/Regular combo in this line; the lites are really not something I use often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably the best i have ever had....
reviews.reviewText: I have my period once a month. I'm 27. So, i have had roughly 11 million periods. Well, it feels like it...ANYWAY, i picked these up on a whim as they were on sale and I will never go back to anything else. The packaging is awesome, its not loud and it opens very easily. You can also put the used (eeeeew!!) cartridge back in it easily and seal it up before tossing it in the trash.The grip is AWESOME. Even if you WANTED to drop it or lose your grip while...you know....inserting it, you couldn't! I hated it when things were too...slippery (eeeew!) and you lost your grip. Fear no more!!These things last forever, are easy to grip and are very nice on the...well, you know.Buy them. Buy them now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most pleasant part of the most unpleasant time of the month
reviews.reviewText: Aunt Flo is pretty heavy - I usually have to wear a tampon and pad. I know - TMI/gross. My girlfriend who has similar issues, recommended these - I live in NY and they're not sold locally, so I bought them on Amazon.They absorb really well, have a comfortable applicator w a great grip and re-sealable packaging to throw away the applicator. It even has a light scent!They're SO much cheaper than any of the other ones sold in our local Duane Reades / CVS and perform so much better. I'm a loyal fan and subscribe to monthly delivery now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try it, you will not be disappointed!
reviews.reviewText: These are just fantastic. I don't like to wear tampons normally due to discomfort. These are the first I've bought in a few years. I thought I'd tried every style there is but this packaging caught my eye along with the rave reviews. The wrapper is unique and very thoughtful, although the opening could stand to be a bit wider. The "heavy" version is able to withstand 5 hours of my heaviest flow which is more than I can say for any other brand. I will never buy a different brand again!

Love the packaging and the pull tabs for the individually wrapped products. Smooth applicator. The box did arrive however opened burnt was just the glue on the box. I felt confident the products were not tempered with due to their smart packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 27, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I like that this mixed flow pack is available, but dislike the price.
good product great packaging... super satisfied

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantasticly absorbant, Keeps goat's milk nice and compact
reviews.reviewText: They absorb a very large amount of goat's milk. A shockingly large amount. I mean, I have probably put a good 14 litres of milk into these things and not a drop was lost!
These are the most comfiest and best non leaking tampons. You sometimes forget your wearing it because it's so comfortable, and easy to throw away in little package it comes in.
